document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Chinese species of Gynnidomorpha Turner, 1916 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Cochylini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Chinese species of Gynnidomorpha Turner, 1916 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Cochylini)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Conchylis minimana Caradja, 1916 : 52
. Type locality: Russia (E. Siberia, Primorsky Krai, Ussuri R., Kazakevich).
Piercea walsinghamana Pierce & Metcalf, 1922 : 38
. Type locality: England (Dorset).
Phalonia walsinghamana : Meyrick, 1928 : 489
.

Material examined. CHINA : Heilongjiang Province:
1 3 , Liangshuiguo Nature Reserves ( 46 ° 32 ʹN, 131 ° 52 ʹE),
23 .vii. 2009
, leg. Weichun Li and Jiayu Liu. Yunnan Province: 1 3 , Zhongdian County ( 27 ° 48 ʹN, 99 ° 42 ʹE), 3150 m ,
14 .vii. 2001
, leg. Houhun Li and Xinpu Wang. (Genitalia slide Nos.: ZX07033 3 , SYH 11642 3 ).

Diagnosis. Adult (
Fig. 8
). Wingspan 12.0 mm. This species is similar to
G. datetis (Diakonoff, 1984 )
superficially, but
G. minimana
can be distinguished by the socius with the distal half about 1 / 3 the width of the basal half, and the cornutus about 3 / 5 the length of the phallus in the male genitalia (
Fig. 17
). In G. d a t e t i s , the distal half of the socius is about 1 / 2 the width of its basal half, and the cornutus is about 1 / 2 the length of the phallus in the male genitalia.

Distribution. China (Hebei, Heilongjiang, Jiangxi, Jilin, Yunnan), Korea , Japan , Russia , Europe. Hostplant.
Pedicularis palustris
L. ( Orobanchaceae ) (Kawabe 1982 ).

Tortrix permixtana
[Denis & Schiffermüller], 1775 : 129 . Type locality: Austria (Vienna).
Cochylis dymotana Treitschke, 1835 : 142
. Type locality: Europe.

Cochylis mussehliana Treitschke, 1835 : 141
. Type locality: Czechoslovakia .

Hostplants.

sp. ( Alismataceae ),
Gentiana
sp. ( Gentianaceae ),
Euphrasia
sp. ( Orobanchaceae ),
Pedicularis
sp. ( Orobanchaceae ) (Kawabe 1982 ).
